name: flavor flavor flavor
description: Custom real estate homepage theme for Steven Novak - BMN Boston Real Estate
author: Steven Novak

changelog.1.5.9: Promotional Video section - Full-width video with autoplay on scroll, looping, no controls, and mute/unmute button. Supports YouTube, Vimeo, and self-hosted videos. Customizer settings for URL, title, subtitle, aspect ratio, background style. Team section now 4 columns on desktop. Improved mobile team card layout with centered images and text. CSP updated for YouTube/Vimeo embeds.
changelog.1.5.8: Homepage image improvements - Neighborhoods/Cities sections redesigned with tags and object-fit:cover for reliable sizing. Images now from most expensive Residential listing per area. Newest Listings filtered to Residential for-sale only, limited to 11 featured cities, max 2 per city for variety.
changelog.1.5.6: Mobile homepage improvements - full-width square property images, better team card photos, improved neighborhood/city card aspect ratios
changelog.1.5.5: Custom dashboard widgets - Platform Overview, Agents & Clients, Appointments, Team Members, Recent Activity
changelog.1.5.4: White-label WordPress admin - Remove all WP branding, logos, dashboard widgets, and footer text. Custom admin styling.
changelog.1.4.8: Remove date/author byline from pages - PHP hook and CSS fallback for GeneratePress entry meta
changelog.1.4.3: Robots.txt fix - exclude file extensions from city rewrite rules to prevent conflicts with robots.txt and sitemaps
changelog.1.4.0: Enhanced city pages with improved rewrite rules and SEO
changelog.1.3.3: Auto-generated city pages - dynamic pages for all cities in database, custom rewrite rules, XML sitemap support
changelog.1.3.2: Dynamic neighborhood filters - property type/beds/baths/price filters from database, pagination, sorting, enhanced listing cards with badges
changelog.1.3.1: Phase 3: SEO Landing Pages - Schema.org markup, neighborhood/school district templates, dynamic meta descriptions
changelog.1.3.0: Phase 2: Lead Generation Tools - CMA request form, property alerts, tour scheduling, mortgage calculator
changelog.1.2.9: Accessibility improvements - WCAG compliance, aria-hidden on SVGs, dialog role on drawer
changelog.1.2.8: Self-hosted fonts and Swiper.js - removed all external CDN dependencies
changelog.1.2.7: Mobile responsive overhaul - hero positioning, drawer fixes, section visibility
changelog.1.2.6: Dynamic vh-based hero photo sizing, mobile section spacing
changelog.1.2.5: Full-width dark glass search form with location autocomplete
changelog.1.2.4: Footer updates and MLS helper improvements
changelog.1.2.1: Market analytics section with MLD shortcodes
changelog.1.1.1: Fixed analytics price display, Residential-only stats, neighborhood images from MLS
changelog.1.1.0: Added mobile drawer, quick search form, neighborhood analytics section, glass-morphism design
